rename_post_ncsmc.py¶

#Rename Post NCSMC

Module for renaming files created by NCSMC.

You can add a line to the end of your NCSMC batch script to call this, e.g.

python /path/to/rename_post_ncsmc.py –projectile=$projectile –target=$target –potential=$potential –freq=$freq –Nmax=$Nmax –affix=$affix

ncsmc_python.rename_post_ncsmc.rename_all(projectile='n', target='Li8', potential='n3lo-NN3Nlnl-srg2.0', freq='20', Nmax='6', affix='')¶

given a bunch of nucleus details, rename files after running ncsmc

Example parameters: projectile = ‘n’ target = ‘Li8’ potential = ‘n3lo-NN3Nlnl-srg2.0’ freq = ‘20’ Nmax = ‘4’ affix = ‘’

NPSM
